name: Bulk Slash
summary: After the great galactic war ends, the planet Blau and its citizens are oppressed and discriminated against by the victors. Former military chief Alois Gardona enacts a coup d'état, to bring Blau back to power, and so a coalition of planets is rallied to put a stop to them. As Chris Dori you are an S.D.F. pilot who must single-handedly win the war.
